scripts.production-build: node ./build/index.js && echo Start server on prod
scripts.postinstall: tsc && echo Command run after install libs
scripts.knex:migrate: knex --knexfile ./src/server/database/knex/Environment.ts migrate:latest && echo Call migration up
scripts.knex:rollback: knex --knexfile ./src/server/database/knex/Environment.ts migrate:rollback && echo Call migration down for last mitration
scripts.knex:rollback-all: knex --knexfile ./src/server/database/knex/Environment.ts migrate:rollback --all && echo Call migration down for all tables
scripts.knex:seed: knex --knexfile ./src/server/database/knex/Environment.ts seed:run && echo Run seeds to populate DB
